title: Direktor Svemira
overview: Unusual tasks, famous guests and a lot of laughter with Ivan Šarić and Luka Petrušić in the new show 'Director of the Universe'!Find an eggplant, paint a horse while riding a horse, find out information from Hungarians, don't blink, move the tent through the tunnel, make your own timer for boiled eggs, sing a serenade - these are just some unusual, fun and wacky tasks awaiting guests of the new RTL the fun show ‘Director of the Universe' which is about to start airing! Originally named ‘Taskmaster', this award-winning show was first shown in the UK, and although it's hard to describe, the point of the show is to bring together five comedians or celebrities with distinctive characters and a sense of humor. They all perform completely insane ‘tasks' given to them by the ‘assistant' director of the universe.
